mapper.select: SELECT A.EMPNO EMPNO ,A.ENAME ENAME ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.HIREDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') HIREDATE FROM EMP A

SELECT A.EMPNO EMPNO ,A.ENAME ENAME ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.HIREDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') HIREDATE FROM EMP A WHERE 1=1
AND A.EMPNO LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND A.ENAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.HIREDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.HIREDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
